directions: Whisk vegetable oil, lemon juice, parsley, salt, garlic, and pepper together in a large serving bowl; add mushrooms and stir to coat.
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate, tossing occasionally, for at least 4 hours.
ingredients: 2 cups vegetable oil, or more to taste
1 cup lemon juice, or more to taste
5 pounds whole fresh mushrooms, thinly sliced
title: Vegan Mushroom Salad
